aWLIRequestedDocumentRuleForEndorsement.RequestSentTo: Only to the Main Primary Owner
aWLIRequestedDocumentRuleForEndorsement.Name: Request for Change in Policy

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription:
Eligibility based on insurance age; Must be between 20 and 70, or 20 and 59 if WOP
Eg. Suppose John's policy anniversary date is Dec 31, 2010 and John's birth date is June 30, 1940, then John's Age is 60 years and 184 days at policy anniversary. So, the Owner Age in this case will be considered as 61 instead of 60 at anniversary. In case John's birthday had happened to be 180 days of within his policy's anniversary date, then the Owner Age will be considered to be 60 years. Simply put, if John was born on July 05, 1940, his age at anniversary would still be considered as 60 instead of 61 as in the earlier case.
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:4) (Implem Version:1)
type tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773884_21 : (IsWaiverofPremium, IsNotWaiverofPremium)
function Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium return tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773884_21 if self.EvaluateClassificationFromRank(0, 1, 'Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium') _Result = tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773884_21(self.V_ForClassificationEvaluation) endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) Result = (self.Insured__Age__At_Last_Renewal >= 20) and (self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal <= 70) if Result = False self.AppendComment('Insured age must be between 20 and 70') endIf if (Result = True) and (self.Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium = IsWaiverofPremium) Result = (self.Insured__Age__At_Last_Renewal >= 20) and (self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal <= 59) if Result = False self.AppendComment('Insured Age must be between 20 and 59 to choose WOP') endIf endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: rule age

aWLICoveragePeriodicPricingBroker.CoveredPricingRuleType: Sum of prices from each insured

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription:
A base rate is calculated based on some tables If WOP has been subscribed, a coefficient is then added
There also fees applied based on billing frequency (see fee rule)
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
uses WFTypes, aWFRuleDesc, aWFStandardPerson
type tWF_Generated_UsedForRules_Gender_318774001_3 : (Male, Female) type tWF_Generated_Smoker_318774281_4 : (Smoker, NonSmoker) type tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318774001_15 : (IsWaiverofPremium, IsNotWaiverofPremium)
function Termto100YearsLifeRates(Gender : tWF_Generated_UsedForRules_Gender_318774001_3, InsuredAge : Int4, InsuredAmount : Num8, SmokerStatus : tWF_Generated_Smoker_318774281_4) return tWFNum8 uses aWFStandAloneRule
var tmpRule : aWFRuleDesc
tmpRule = self.GetExactRuleToExecuteFromRankInRuleDesc(0, self.CurrentDate) if tmpRule <> Nil aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(Gender, 0, tmpRule) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(InsuredAge, 1, tmpRule) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(InsuredAmount, 2, tmpRule) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(SmokerStatus, 3, tmpRule) tmpRule.GetStandAloneResult(_Result, self) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).CleanParamsAfterExecution(tmpRule) else self.AppendComment('No rule version defined at this date') endIf endFunc
function TenYearWaiverofPremiumRates(Gender : tWF_Generated_UsedForRules_Gender_318774001_3, InsuredAge : Int4) return tWFNum8 uses aWFStandAloneRule
var tmpRule : aWFRuleDesc
tmpRule = self.GetExactRuleToExecuteFromRankInRuleDesc(1, self.CurrentDate) if tmpRule <> Nil aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(Gender, 0, tmpRule) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(InsuredAge, 1, tmpRule) tmpRule.GetStandAloneResult(_Result, self) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).CleanParamsAfterExecution(tmpRule) else self.AppendComment('No rule version defined at this date') endIf endFunc
function Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium return tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318774001_15 if self.EvaluateClassificationFromRank(2, 1, 'Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium') _Result = tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318774001_15(self.V_ForClassificationEvaluation) endIf endFunc
function Insured__Classifications__Smoker return tWF_Generated_Smoker_318774281_4 if self.EvaluateClassificationFromRank(3, 6, 'Insured__Classifications__Smoker') _Result = tWF_Generated_Smoker_318774281_4(self.V_ForClassificationEvaluation) endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : tWFNum8) var WOPPremium : Num8
if self.Insured__Age__Exact = 100 Result = 0 else ; if self.Insured__Gender = gMale Result = self.Termto100YearsLifeRates(Male, self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal, self.Coverage__CoverageAmount, self.Insured__Classifications__Smoker) else Result = self.Termto100YearsLifeRates(Female, self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal, self.Coverage__CoverageAmount, self.Insured__Classifications__Smoker) endIf ; self.AppendBillLineDetail(Result, 'Base Rate') ; if self.Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium = IsWaiverofPremium if self.Insured__Gender = gMale Result = Result * self.TenYearWaiverofPremiumRates(Male, self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal) else Result = Result * self.TenYearWaiverofPremiumRates(Female, self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal) endIf self.AppendBillLineDetail(WOPPremium, 'WOP Rate') endIf endIf endProc

aWFTableDesc.Name: Ten Year Waiver of Premium Rates

aWFStandAloneTable.Name: Ten Year Waiver of Premium Rates

aWFRuleDesc.Name: Rate

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription:
Insured up to 100. Age calculated based on insurance age.
Eg. Suppose John's policy anniversary date is Dec 31, 2010 and John's birth date is June 30, 1940, then John's Age is 60 years and 184 days at policy anniversary. So, the Owner Age in this case will be considered as 61 instead of 60 at anniversary. In case John's birthday had happened to be 180 days of within his policy's anniversary date, then the Owner Age will be considered to be 60 years. Simply put, if John was born on July 05, 1940, his age at anniversary would still be considered as 60 instead of 61 as in the earlier case.
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:3) (Implem Version:1)
uses WFTypes, aWFDateType
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : tWFDate) var birthdate : tWFDate var nearestDate : tWFDate var age : Int4
birthdate = self.Insured__BirthDate Result = self.Option__SubscriptionDate nearestDate = Result self.IncMonths(6, nearestDate) age = nearestDate.type.GetNbYearsDifference(birthdate, nearestDate) ; while age < 100 self.IncYears(1, Result) nearestDate = Result self.IncMonths(6, nearestDate) age = nearestDate.type.GetNbYearsDifference(birthdate, nearestDate) endWhile endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Based on insurance age

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: Based on medical eveidence table
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
uses aWFRuleDesc
function MedicalEvidenceRule(Age : Int4, Amount : Num8) return Boolean uses aWFStandAloneRule
var tmpRule : aWFRuleDesc
tmpRule = self.GetExactRuleToExecuteFromRankInRuleDesc(0, self.CurrentDate) if tmpRule <> Nil aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(Age, 0, tmpRule) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(Amount, 1, tmpRule) tmpRule.GetStandAloneResult(_Result, self) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).CleanParamsAfterExecution(tmpRule) else self.AppendComment('No rule version defined at this date') endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) Result = self.MedicalEvidenceRule(self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal, self.Coverage__CoverageAmount) endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Result = ILMedicalEvidenceTable(Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: This rule is applied for 'Electrocardiogram' document. It is requested in the following cases: - The insured age is greater or equal to 18 and less or equal to 40, and the coverage amount is greater than 3 000 000 and less or equal to 5 000 000 - The insured age is greater than 40 and less or equal to 50, and the coverage amount is greater than 1 000 000 and less or equal to 5 000 000 - The insured age is greater than 50 and less or equal to 65, and the coverage amount is greater than 250 000 and less or equal to 5 000 000 - The insured age is greater than 65 and less or equal to 70, and the coverage amount is greater than 150 000 and less or equal to 5 000 000 - The insured age is greater than 70, and the coverage amount is less or equal to 5 000 000
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:1) (Implem Version:1)
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) if (self.Insured__Age__Exact >= 18) and (self.Insured__Age__Exact <= 40) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 3000000) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount <= 5000000) Result = True endIf if (self.Insured__Age__Exact > 40) and (self.Insured__Age__Exact <= 50) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 1000000) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount <= 5000000) Result = True endIf if (self.Insured__Age__Exact > 50) and (self.Insured__Age__Exact <= 55) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 50000) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount <= 5000000) Result = True endIf if (self.Insured__Age__Exact > 55) and (self.Insured__Age__Exact <= 65) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 250000) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount <= 5000000) Result = True endIf if (self.Insured__Age__Exact > 65) and (self.Insured__Age__Exact <= 70) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 150000) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount <= 5000000) Result = True endIf if (self.Insured__Age__Exact > 70) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount <= 5000000) Result = True endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Electrocardiogram

aWLISubscribedCoverageRequestedDocumentR.Name: Electrocardiogram

aWLISubscribedCoverageRequestedDocumentR.RequestSentTo: Only to the Main Primary Owner

; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:1) (Implem Version:1)
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) if (self.Insured__Age__Exact >= 18) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 5000000) Result = True endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Stress ECG

aWLISubscribedCoverageRequestedDocumentR.Name: Stress Electrocardiogram

aWLISubscribedCoverageRequestedDocumentR.RequestSentTo: Only to the Main Primary Owner

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: This rule is applied for 'Urine' document. It is requested in the following cases: - The insured age is greater or equal to 18 and less or equal to 40, and the coverage amount is greater than 250 000 - The insured age is greater than 40 and less or equal to 55, and the coverage amount is greater than 150 000 - The insured age is greater than 55
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:1) (Implem Version:1)
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) if (self.Insured__Age__Exact >= 18) and (self.Insured__Age__Exact <= 40) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 250000) Result = True endIf if (self.Insured__Age__Exact > 40) and (self.Insured__Age__Exact <= 55) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 150000) Result = True endIf if self.Insured__Age__Exact > 55 Result = True endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Urine

aWLISubscribedCoverageRequestedDocumentR.Name: Urine

aWLISubscribedCoverageRequestedDocumentR.RequestSentTo: Only to the Main Primary Owner

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: This rule is applied for 'Vitals' document. It is requested in the following cases: - The insured age is greater or equal to 18 and less or equal to 40, and the coverage amount is greater than 250 000 and less or equal to 1 000 000 - The insured age is greater than 40 and less or equal to 50, and the coverage amount is greater than 150 000 and less or equal to 500 000
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:1) (Implem Version:1)
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) if (self.Insured__Age__Exact >= 18) and (self.Insured__Age__Exact <= 40) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 250000) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount <= 1000000) Result = True endIf if (self.Insured__Age__Exact > 40) and (self.Insured__Age__Exact <= 50) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount > 150000) and (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount <= 500000) Result = True endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Vitals

aWLISubscribedCoverageRequestedDocumentR.Name: Vitals

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: WOP can be deliver if terminal illness
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:3) (Implem Version:1)
type tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773432_20 : (IsWaiverofPremium, IsNotWaiverofPremium)
function Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium return tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773432_20 if self.EvaluateClassificationFromRank(0, 1, 'Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium') _Result = tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773432_20(self.V_ForClassificationEvaluation) endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) if (self.Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium = IsWaiverofPremium) and (self.Loss__Event = 'TMI') Result = True endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: can deliver if

aWLI_WOPBenefitWithOptions.Name: Waiver of Premium

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: Accelerated Death Claim Amount is calculate at up to 70% of the Coverage Amount. Note: the restriction of min $10,000 and max $250,000 is at the Can deliver rule. Payment can only be delivered once
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:1) (Implem Version:1)
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Num8) if self.Coverage__CoverageAmount * 0.7 <= 250000 if (self.Claim__ExactCost <= self.Coverage__CoverageAmount * 0.7) and (self.Claim__ExactCost >= 10000) Result = self.Claim__ExactCost elseif self.Claim__ExactCost < 10000 Result = 10000 elseif self.Claim__ExactCost > self.Coverage__CoverageAmount * 0.7 Result = self.Coverage__CoverageAmount * 0.7 endIf elseif (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount * 0.7 > 250000) and (self.Claim__ExactCost > 250000) Result = 250000 elseif (self.Coverage__CoverageAmount * 0.7 > 250000) and (self.Claim__ExactCost <= 250000) Result = self.Claim__ExactCost endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Accelerated Death Claim

aWLIClaimRequestedDocumentRule.RequestSentTo: Only to the Main Primary Owner
aWLIClaimRequestedDocumentRule.Name: Doctor's confirmation of Terminal Illness

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription:
Waiver of Premium Classification must be present on 10 year Term coverage to allow a claim of Accelerate Death Benefit
Maximum claim is $250,000 minimum claim is $10,000
Only be one claim against the policy during it's lifetime
Cannot be within 2 years of the expiration date. We will handle this manually for now.
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
type tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773432_20 : (IsWaiverofPremium, IsNotWaiverofPremium)
function Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium return tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773432_20 if self.EvaluateClassificationFromRank(0, 1, 'Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium') _Result = tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773432_20(self.V_ForClassificationEvaluation) endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) if self.Loss__Event <> 'TMI' self.AppendInfoMessage('Not a terminal illness') Result = False elseif self.Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium = IsNotWaiverofPremium Result = False self.AppendInfoMessage('Not the WOP option') else if (self.DependentDelivered__AmountAlreadyPaid <= 0) and (self.Claim__ExactCost <= 2500000) and (self.Claim__ExactCost >= 10000) Result = True else Result = False self.AppendInfoMessage('Benefit must be at least $10000 and not more than 250000') endIf endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Eligibility

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: The Death Benefit is equal to the Coverage Amount minus the Accelerated Benefit Amount
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:1) (Implem Version:1)
type tWF_Generated_WasAcceleratedBenefitExercised_318769176_4 : (IsWasAcceleratedBenefitExercised, IsNotWasAcceleratedBenefitExercised)
function DeliveredService__Classifications__WasAcceleratedBenefitExercis return tWF_Generated_WasAcceleratedBenefitExercised_318769176_4 if self.EvaluateClassificationFromRank(0, 11, 'DeliveredService__Classifications__WasAcceleratedBenefitExercis') _Result = tWF_Generated_WasAcceleratedBenefitExercised_318769176_4(self.V_ForClassificationEvaluation) endIf endFunc
function DeliveredService__Dynamic_Data__AcceleratedBenefitAmount return Num8 type tpValue : .Num8
var p : Num8
if self.EvaluateFieldDescFromRank(1, 12, 'DeliveredService__Dynamic_Data__AcceleratedBenefitAmount') p = tpValue(self.pFieldValue). _Result = p endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Num8) if (self.DeliveredService__Classifications__WasAcceleratedBenefitExercis = IsWasAcceleratedBenefitExercised) and (self.DeliveredService__Dynamic_Data__AcceleratedBenefitAmount > 0) Result = self.Coverage__CoverageAmount - self.DeliveredService__Dynamic_Data__AcceleratedBenefitAmount elseif (self.DeliveredService__Classifications__WasAcceleratedBenefitExercis = IsWasAcceleratedBenefitExercised) and (self.DeliveredService__Dynamic_Data__AcceleratedBenefitAmount <= 0) self.AppendErrorMessage('Please input the amount of Accelerated Benefit Used') else Result = self.Coverage__CoverageAmount endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Death Claim is paid at total benefit minus Accelerated Death

aWLIClaimRequestedDocumentRule.RequestSentTo: Only to the Main Primary Owner
aWLIClaimRequestedDocumentRule.Name: Death certificate

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: Not possible in case of suicide, and/or criminal activity
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:4) (Implem Version:1)
type tWF_Generated_DeathduetoCriminalActivity_318769166_11 : (IsDeathduetoCriminalActivity, IsNotDeathduetoCriminalActivity)
function DeliveredService__Classifications__DeathduetoCriminalActivity return tWF_Generated_DeathduetoCriminalActivity_318769166_11 if self.EvaluateClassificationFromRank(0, 11, 'DeliveredService__Classifications__DeathduetoCriminalActivity') _Result = tWF_Generated_DeathduetoCriminalActivity_318769166_11(self.V_ForClassificationEvaluation) endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) Result = True if self.Loss__Event = 'SUIC' Result = False self.AppendInfoMessage('Suicide') endIf if self.DeliveredService__Classifications__DeathduetoCriminalActivity = IsDeathduetoCriminalActivity Result = False self.AppendInfoMessage('Criminal activity') endIf endProc

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: The minimum decrease amount must 10 000
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) var changeInCoverageAmount : Num8
changeInCoverageAmount = self.Endorsement__PreviousCoverageAmount - self.Endorsement__NewCoverageAmount if changeInCoverageAmount < 10000 ; min decrease amount = 10 000 Result = False self.AppendErrorMessage(self.Msg('0005')) else Result = True endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: endorsement decrease

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: Each increase is underwritten
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) if self.Endorsement__NewCoverageAmount > self.Endorsement__PreviousCoverageAmount Result = True else Result = False endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: UnderwritingRule

aWLIOfferedLifeOrDisabilityCoverage.Name: Term to 100

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: The insured must be between 20 and 64. We are not considering his exact age at subscription, but his age minus and plus 6 months. Eg. Suppose John's policy anniversary date is Dec 31, 2010 and John's birth date is June 30, 1940, then John's Age is 60 years and 184 days at policy anniversary. So, the Owner Age in this case will be considered as 61 instead of 60 at anniversary. In case John's birthday had happened to be 180 days of within his policy's anniversary date, then the Owner Age will be considered to be 60 years. Simply put, if John was born on July 05, 1940, his age at anniversary would still be considered as 60 instead of 61 as in the earlier case.
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) Result = (self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal >= 20) and (self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal <= 64) if Result = False self.AppendComment('Insured Age must be between 20 and 64') endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Eligibility rule

aWLICoveragePeriodicPricingBroker.CoveredPricingRuleType: Sum of prices from each insured

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: A base rate is calculated based on some tables If WOP has been subscribed, a coefficient is then added
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
uses aWFRuleDesc, WFTypes, aWFStandardPerson
type tWF_Generated_UsedForRules_Gender_318773884_3 : (Male, Female) type tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773884_21 : (IsWaiverofPremium, IsNotWaiverofPremium)
function TenYearWaiverofPremiumRates(Gender : tWF_Generated_UsedForRules_Gender_318773884_3, InsuredAge : Int4) return Num8 uses aWFStandAloneRule
var tmpRule : aWFRuleDesc
tmpRule = self.GetExactRuleToExecuteFromRankInRuleDesc(0, self.CurrentDate) if tmpRule <> Nil aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(Gender, 0, tmpRule) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(InsuredAge, 1, tmpRule) tmpRule.GetStandAloneResult(_Result, self) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).CleanParamsAfterExecution(tmpRule) else self.AppendComment('No rule version defined at this date') endIf endFunc
function Termto100AccidentalDeathBenefitRates(InsuredAge : Int4, Gender : tWF_Generated_UsedForRules_Gender_318773884_3) return Num8 uses aWFStandAloneRule
var tmpRule : aWFRuleDesc
tmpRule = self.GetExactRuleToExecuteFromRankInRuleDesc(1, self.CurrentDate) if tmpRule <> Nil aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(InsuredAge, 0, tmpRule) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(Gender, 1, tmpRule) tmpRule.GetStandAloneResult(_Result, self) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).CleanParamsAfterExecution(tmpRule) else self.AppendComment('No rule version defined at this date') endIf endFunc
function Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium return tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773884_21 if self.EvaluateClassificationFromRank(2, 1, 'Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium') _Result = tWF_Generated_WaiverofPremium_318773884_21(self.V_ForClassificationEvaluation) endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : tWFNum8) var TableRate : Num8 var WOPPremium : Num8
TableRate = self.Termto100AccidentalDeathBenefitRates(self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal, Male) if self.Insured__Gender = gMale Result = self.Termto100AccidentalDeathBenefitRates(self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal, Male) else Result = self.Termto100AccidentalDeathBenefitRates(self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal, Female) endIf ; self.AppendBillLineDetail(TableRate, 'Base Rate') Result = TableRate if self.Contract__Classifications__WaiverofPremium = IsWaiverofPremium if self.Insured__Gender = gMale WOPPremium = self.TenYearWaiverofPremiumRates(Male, self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal) Result += Result * WOPPremium else WOPPremium = self.TenYearWaiverofPremiumRates(Female, self.Insured__Age__Nearest_At_Last_Renewal) Result += Result * WOPPremium endIf self.AppendBillLineDetail(WOPPremium, 'WOP Rate') endIf endProc

aWFTableDesc.Name: Ten Year Waiver of Premium Rates

aWFStandAloneTable.Name: Ten Year Waiver of Premium Rates

aWFRuleDesc.Name: Rate

aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription:
The person is eligible up to 65. We are looking at his age at policy anniversary date. And we check his age based on insurance age.
Eg. Suppose John's policy anniversary date is Dec 31, 2010 and John's birth date is June 30, 1940, then John's Age is 60 years and 184 days at policy anniversary. So, the Owner Age in this case will be considered as 61 instead of 60 at anniversary. In case John's birthday had happened to be 180 days of within his policy's anniversary date, then the Owner Age will be considered to be 60 years. Simply put, if John was born on July 05, 1940, his age at anniversary would still be considered as 60 instead of 61 as in the earlier case.
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:3) (Implem Version:1)
uses WFTypes, aWFDateType
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : tWFDate) var birthdate : tWFDate var nearestDate : tWFDate var age : Int4
birthdate = self.Insured__BirthDate Result = self.Option__SubscriptionDate nearestDate = Result self.IncMonths(6, nearestDate) age = nearestDate.type.GetNbYearsDifference(birthdate, nearestDate) ; while age < 65 self.IncYears(1, Result) nearestDate = Result self.IncMonths(6, nearestDate) age = nearestDate.type.GetNbYearsDifference(birthdate, nearestDate) endWhile endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Eligible up to 65

aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:1) (Implem Version:1)
uses aWFRuleDesc
function MedicalEvidenceRule(Age : Int4, Amount : Num8) return Boolean uses aWFStandAloneRule
var tmpRule : aWFRuleDesc
tmpRule = self.GetExactRuleToExecuteFromRankInRuleDesc(0, self.CurrentDate) if tmpRule <> Nil aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(Age, 0, tmpRule) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).AppendParam(Amount, 1, tmpRule) tmpRule.GetStandAloneResult(_Result, self) aWFStandAloneRule(tmpRule.MyOwner).CleanParamsAfterExecution(tmpRule) else self.AppendComment('No rule version defined at this date') endIf endFunc
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) Result = self.MedicalEvidenceRule(self.Insured__Age__At_Last_Renewal, self.Coverage__CoverageAmount) endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Med Evid

aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_LifeDisabilityRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) var changeInCoverageAmount : Num8
changeInCoverageAmount = self.Endorsement__PreviousCoverageAmount - self.Endorsement__NewCoverageAmount if changeInCoverageAmount < 10000 ; min decrease amount = 10 000 Result = False self.AppendErrorMessage(self.Msg('0005')) else Result = True endIf endProc
